Our technical services and solutions cover the following disciplines:” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689989995684{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1691001212856{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #edeff5 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Well Services” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689846755159{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”“We deliver unparalleled well intervention and production optimization solutions through our dedicated Well Services Division.“
With a team of experienced professionals and state-of-the-art equipment, we offer a range of services such as well-stimulation, acidizing, and hydraulic fracturing. Our goal is to enhance production rates, maximize reservoir potential, and extend the lifespan of your wells.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689846795500{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1691001228517{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #edeff5 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Drilling Tools & Rentals” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689846844567{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”We understand the importance of having reliable and efficient drilling tools for successful operations. Our extensive inventory of drilling tools and equipment is available for rental, ensuring that you have access to top-quality tools tailored to your specific drilling needs. From drill pipes to drill bits, we have you covered with our comprehensive range of equipment.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689846863973{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8421″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691185952523{border-radius: 2px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1691001246952{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8424″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691186228990{border-radius: 2px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Slickline Services” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689846883018{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our slickline services are designed to provide precise and efficient well intervention solutions. Advanced slickline tools and techniques are Specifically designed to provide precise and efficient well intervention solutions. Our advanced slickline tools are fully … utilized to perform a variety of operations, including logging, perforating, and wellbore clean-up. We strive to optimize your well performance and minimize downtime, all while ensuring the highest level of safety and quality.

Assets
✔ Modern Generation
✔ ASEP-NOV Slickline Units
✔ Pressure Control Equipment
✔ 10K Pr. Rating & 5” ID
✔ Slickline Downhole Tools
✔ Bottom Hole Pressure Gauges” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1691001704498{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1691001041777{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #edeff5 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Well Bore Clean-out & Filtration Services” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689846948872{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Maintaining clean and efficient wellbores is vital for optimal production and operational efficiency. Our well bore clean-out and filtration services are tailored to remove debris, scale, and other obstructions that may hinder your operations. With our expertise and specialized equipment, we ensure the integrity and cleanliness of your wellbores, enhancing overall productivity.

Assets for Well-Bore projects

✔ Casing Scrappers
✔ Brush Tools
✔ Magnet Tools
✔ Waste Retriever Tool
✔ Circulating Tool
✔ Well Head Jetting Tool” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1691001647983{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8425″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691186261748{border-radius: 2px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1691001069025{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8421″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691186361773{border-radius: 2px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Fishing” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689846989277{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”In the event of equipment failure or obstructions in the well, our fishing services come to the rescue. Our skilled team of professionals utilizes innovative techniques and tools to recover lost or stuck equipment, ensuring minimal downtime and maximum efficiency. We are committed to resolving any fishing challenges you may encounter, ensuring the smooth continuation of your operations. Our extensive inventory of drilling tools and equipment is available for rental, ensuring that you have access to top-quality tools tailored to your specific drilling needs. From drill pipes to drill bits, we have you covered with our comprehensive range of equipment” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1691002294925{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

ASSETS

✔ Fishing Jars      ✔ Magnets
✔ Accelerators     ✔ Wash Pipes
✔ Bumper Subs   ✔ Basket Grapples
✔ Safety Joints    ✔ Spiral Grapples
✔ Junk Mills         ✔ String Cutters
✔ Junk Baskets    ✔ Drilling Jars
✔ LIB                   ✔ Stabilizers
✔ Spears              ✔ Circulation Subs
✔ String               ✔ Cross-Overs
✔ Bit Subs            ✔ Over-shots of Various Sizes[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1691001099290{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #edeff5 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Well Testing” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689847029612{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Accurate and comprehensive well testing is crucial for understanding reservoir behavior and optimizing production strategies. Our well testing services encompass a range of solutions, including pressure testing, flow rate measurement, and data analysis. With our advanced testing equipment and analytical expertise, we provide valuable insights into your reservoir’s performance, helping you make informed decisions.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689847044644{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8426″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691186393534{border-radius: 2px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1691001113517{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8427″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691186431793{border-radius: 2px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Marine Support Services” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689847062845{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Operating in offshore environments requires specialized support and services. Our marine support services cater to the unique needs of offshore operations, offering logistics, vessel support, equipment transportation, and personnel transportation. With a focus on safety and efficiency, we ensure seamless operations and effective project management for offshore endeavors. Our diverse range includes of Marine support services such as:
✔ Subsea installation engineering
✔ Diving and ROV
✔ Offshore decommissioning inspection, repair and maintenance
✔ Construction and installation support
✔ Commissioning, cable and pipe laying projects
✔ Key operational personnel
✔ Maritime Subsea Surveys
✔ QHSE Subsea
✔ AHTS
✔ FSV
✔ Barges
✔ PSV
✔ Rigs
✔ All types of vessels” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1691002786809{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
